cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-12 -DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/usr/bin/g++-12 -DCMAKE_DEPENDS_USE_COMPILER=FALSE -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" -S /home/pedro/SimPlas/ConsoleApplication1 -B /home/pedro/SimPlas/ConsoleApplication1/cmake-build-debug
